ModMetaData.name: [ELIF] Flooring and Decorative Options
ModMetaData.description:
ELIFs Flooring and Decorative Options aims to provide many more polished vanilla like flooring and decorative options to Rimworld, built to be used along side with Dubs Paint Tool and Clutter Doors. 

Updated: M-05/D-22/Y-2020

Translations:
German Translation by: Erdnussbrot
ModMetaData.author: ELIF
